mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.student_id AS "studentId", a.name AS "name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.score AS "score", a.score_type AS "scoreType", s.id AS "student.id", s.name AS "student.name"
LEFT JOIN student s ON s.no = a.student_id LEFT JOIN classinfo c ON c.id = s.class_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentrecord( id, student_id, name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, score, score_type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{studentId}, #{name}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{score}, #{scoreType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE studentrecord SET student_id = #{studentId}, name = #{name}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, score = #{score}, score_type = #{scoreType} WHERE id = #{id}
